alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 2:10AM EST until February 21 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Woodbury affecting Warren and Butler Counties. Green River at Rochester affecting Muhlenberg, Butler and Ohio Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TUESDAY EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...From this evening to late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 37.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 35.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 38.5 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
